Kaili city in Guizhou, capital of Qiandongnan Miao and Dong autonomous prefecture 黔東南苗族侗族自治州|黔东南苗族侗族自治州

sentences.english: Carey is listed as a co-writer on every track.
sentences.chinese: 凯里在每个轨道上被列出如一位共作家。

sentences.english: Kaili has a population of 50, 000 and is a major producer of rice.
sentences.chinese: 凯里市的人口约5万人，也是水稻的主要产地。

sentences.english: Before the year was out she bore him a son, Arcas by name.
sentences.chinese: 没出一年凯里斯特给宙斯生了一个儿子，取名阿卡斯。

sentences.english: Kaili is a city in Qiandongnan Miao and Dong Autonomous Prefecture, Guizhou province, China.
sentences.chinese: 凯里市，位于贵州省黔东南苗族侗族自治州。

sentences.english: 'I don't think they are losing money on the thing, ' Carey said.
sentences.chinese: 凯里说，我认为他们做这个东西没有亏钱。

sentences.english: Skerrit indicated that since both sides established their diplomatic ties, the bilateral relations have developed rapidly.
sentences.chinese: 斯凯里特表示，多中建交后，两国关系发展迅速。

sentences.english: On the evening of the same day, Prime Minister Roosevelt Skerrit hosted a banquet for the Chinese delegation.
sentences.chinese: 当日晚，斯凯里特总理宴请代表团一行。

sentences.english: Prior to the talks, Wen held a welcome ceremony for Skerrit.
sentences.chinese: 会谈前，温家宝为斯凯里特举行了欢迎仪式。

sentences.english: Kaili is host to more than 100 Miao festivals throughout the year.
sentences.chinese: 每年凯里有超过100个的苗族节日。
